string.value: لا يبدوا إنك انضممت لأي لعبة

{0} بدء اللعب استخدمة علامة /join للانضمام
تم بدء اللعب على نمط الفوضى بواسطة {0}! استخدم /join للانضمام
لا يمكنك الانضمام الآن. انتظر حتى بداية اللعبة القادمة.
لقد انضممت مسبقاً
باقي دقيقة واحدة للانضمام اضغط /join للانضمام
{0} ثانية للانضمام. اضغط /join للانضمام.
عدد اللاعبين غير كافي. لا يمكن بدء اللعب .
يتم إعداد اللعبة و توزيع الأدوار.
{0} محظور
{0}, رجاء غير اسمك لتتمكن من الانضمام
عذراً، عدد اللاعبين على أقصاه.!
{0} انضم للعب. {1} لاعبين, {2} أقل عدد للاعبين, {3} أكبر عدد للاعبين
{0} رجاء اضغط start بالأسفل أو {1} و ابدأ بتشغيلي بالضغط على Strat me. لا يمكنك الانضمام إن لم تقم بذلك
لا يمكنك الهروب فأنت ميت. ارجع للأرض تباً
{0} فر فزعاً!
{0} لاعبين متبقين.
لم أطلب منك شيئاً لحد الآن!
لا يبدو أنك تلعب
لا أجد لاعباً بهذا الاسم!
هذا الاسم غير مقبول!
{0} صوت لأكل {1}.
{0} صوت لاعدام {1}.
{0} لم يصوت لليلتين على التوالي. يبدو أن{0} مات فجأةً. {1}
أيها الخائن .... أنت الآن الذئب
تم قبول الاختيار
\nالعراف هو{0}.
{0} كان العراف. كونك تلميذ العراف فأنت الآن العراف الجديد.
{0} كان تلميذ العراف و أخذ مكان{1} كعراف جديد.
أنت ترى أن {0} هو {1}!
من تريد أن تعدم؟
من الذي تريد أن تحقق في هويته؟
من اللذي تريد أن تطلق عليه؟ باقي {0} رصاصة.
من تريد أن تزور؟
من تريد أن ترى؟
من تريد أن تحرس؟
من تريد أن تأكل؟
من تريد أن تقنص؟
من هو قدوتك؟
من تريد أن تحوله إلى معتقدك؟
تأكد أن تتناقش مع {0}
and
أنت ملعون. أنت الآن قروي و لكن إذا قتلك المستذئبون فستتحول إلى مستذئب أنت أيضا.
أنت المحقق. بامكانك اختيار أحد اللاعبين لتعرف دوره و لكن سيكون هناك احتمال أن يكتشف الذئاب أنك المحقق.(نسبة الاحتمالية هي 40%)
أنت السكران
أنت الملاك الحارس. في كل ليلة بإمكانك أن تختار أحد اللاعبين لتحميه.إذا اخترت الذئب فهناك احتمال أنت تموت (نسبة الاحتمالية 50%).
أنت الصياد. لديك رصاصيتن. خلال اليوم بإمكانك أن تطلق النار على أحد اللاعبين. الكل سيسمع صوت اطلاق النار و سيعرفون أنك الصياد و لست الذئب.

أنت الزوارة. في كل ليلة سيكون في إمكانك أن تختار أحد اللاعبين لتزوره لتتأكد أنه ليس الذئب. و لكن إن زرت الذئب أو زرت أحد اللاعبين الذي سيقتله الذئب في تلك الليلة فستموت أنت أيضا. ولكن لو كنت تزور أحد اللاعبين و كان الذئب قد أختار أن يقتلك فستنجو لأنك لست في منزلك في تلك الليلة.
أنت الخائن. أنت الآن مجرد قروي و لكن لو مات كل المستذئبين فستتحول أنت إلى مستذئب. لو حاول العراف أنت يكتشف دورك فمن الممكن أن لا يتعرف عليك كذئب.
أنت الذئب. بإمكانك كل ليلة أن تختار أن تقتل أحد اللاعبين.
أنت العراف. بإمكانك كل ليلة أن تختار أحد اللاعبين ليتم كشف دوره لك.
أنت قروي. لا تعرف شيئاً سوى العمل في الحقل و أن تأكل من قبل الذئب.
أنت الدباغ. لو تم التصويت لاعدامك فستفوز تلقائياً!
أنت طفل مسعور. اختر أحد اللاعبين ليكون قدوتك. لو مات قدوتك فستتحول إلى مستذئب.
أنت المراقب. سيتم اخبارك من هو العراف الحقيقي. هذه هي وظيفتك الوحيدة.
أنت تلميذ العراف. إذا مات العراف (الحقيقي) فستكون أنت العراف.
أنت المبشر. كل ليلة بإمكانك أن تختار أحد اللاعبين لتحوله إلى جماعتك. إذا كان جميع الأحياء من جماعتك فستفوزون.
أنت صياد المبشر. تحاول منع جماعة المبشر من الانتشار. كل ليلة بإمكانك أن تختار أحد اللاعبين و إن كان هو المبشر فسيموت. إذا حاول المبشر أن يحولك إلى جماعته فإن آخر عضو انضم إلى جماعة المبشر سيموت.
قارب اليوم على الانتهاء. و اجتمع أهل القرية ليقررون من سيتم إعدامه في هذا المساء. باقي {0} ثانية للتصويت!
إنه يوم جديد. لديكم جميعا {0} ثانية لاتهام من تريدون أو الدفاع عن أنفسكم أو مجرد الحديث.
لقد حل الليل. الكل اتجه لسريره لينام بعد يوم شاق من العمل. أما اللاعبين الليليين فلديهم {0} ثانية لتحديد خياراتهم!
لقد اتخذ القرويين قرارهم باعدام {0} {1}
لم يتفق أهل القرية على من يجب إعدامه. و أنتهى اليوم بدون إعدام أي أحد.
لم يصوت أحد لذلك لن يتم إعدام أي لاعب..
اجتمع أهل القرية في صباح اليوم و لكنهم لم يروا {0} و عندما ذهبوا لمنزله وجدوه ميتاً غارقاً في دمه. رحمك الله يا {0}.
جاء الصباح و لاحظ أهل القرية ظهور {0} في صورة الملاك الحارس.
عندما خرج الجميع من منازلهم رأوا قطعاً مبعثرة من بندقية و أصابع مقطوعة و أرجل مبتورة ثم رأوا جثة{0} في بئر القرية. لقد مات الصياد.
عندما استيقظ الجميع في صباح اليوم التالي وجدوا بقايا جثة {0} متناثرة عند البلورة السحرية و بطاقات قراءة الطالع. لقد مات العراف.
استيقظ أهل القرية على رائحة احتراق الخشب و الكحول. بعد اخماد الحريق تم العثور على بقايا جثة {0} ممزقة إلى أشلاء.
مع شروق الشمس، عثر أهل القرية على جثة {0} و بجانبها كرة زجاجية كان يعتقد أنها البلورة السحرية. يا له من غبي!
عندما أستيقظ القرويين كانت رائحة سيئة تملأ المكان. اتبع أهل القرية الرائحة عثروا على جثة {0} بدون رأس.{1}
رائحة سيئة جداً تنبعث من منزل {0}. عندما دخل القرويين إلى المنزل وجدوا جثة المبشر ملقاة على أرضية المنزل مقتولاً من قبل صياد المبشر!
من حسن حظ القرويين أن الجميع بخير. لم يهاجم الذئب أحداً من القرويين في الليلة الماضية.
لقد قتلتك الذئاب. و لأنك ملعون فقد تحولت أنت أيضاً إلى ذئب!
زملائك الذئاب هم: {0}
{0} كان الملعون و لذلك فلقد تحول إلى مستذئب. تهانينا. لقد أصبح لك زميل جديد!
لقد التهمك الذئاب.
أوه ... تباً {0} كان السكران و بالتهامك له فقد أصبحت أنت سكران أيضاً و لن تتمكن من الهجوم على القرويين الليلة القادمة...
لقد قمت بحراسة ذئب فأكلك.
لقد أنقذت حياة{0}!
لم تتم مهاجمة{0} لذلك لم تقم بفعل أي شيء
ذهبت لحراسة{0}, و لكنه لم يكن بالمنزل!
الملاك الحارس كان يحرسك في الليلة الماضية و أنقذك من محاولة قتل!
الزوارة اختارت الوقت الخطأ لتبقى في المنزل. {0} قتلها الذئاب!
لسوء حظك! {0} لم يكن بالمنزل. ستنام جائعاً لهذه الليلة.
ذهبت لزيارة منزل {0} و لكنك تفاجأت بأنه منزل الذئب. لقد قتلك الذئب.
الزوارة {0} وجدت مقتولة و مقطعة الأوصال في وسط المدينة
{0} ذهب لزيارة منزل {1}للحديث و تمضية الوقت و لكن بدلاً من ذلك وجد {0} ذئبا يلتهم {1}! لاحظ الذئب وجود {0} فهاجهمه و التهمه أيضا! {0} مات.
لقد زرت {0} و وجدت أنه ليس الذئب!
لقد زارتك الزوارة...
لقد أمسكت بـ {0} و هو يتلصص. لابد أنه المحقق!
اكتشفت من تلصصك أن {0} هو {1}.
لقد تأكد {0} من هوية الزوارة و نفذ انتقامه. {1} مات.
فجأة تردد صدى طلق ناري و عندما هرع أهل القرية إلى مكان الصوت وجدوا {0} يقف بجوار جثة {1}مصوبا بنقديقته إلى رأسه. {2}
فاز المستذئب!
فاز المستذئبون!
فاز القرويون!
لقد أعدمتم الدباغ. لقد فاز الدباغ.
باقي الأعضاء الأحياء و أدوارهم و فرقهم:
{0}صوت لتبشير{1}
{0} تم ارساله ليقوم بتبشير {1} و لكنه اكتشف أنه صياد المبشرين! {0}مات!
{0}أتى ليبشرك و لكنك طعنته بسيفك . مات أحد المبشرين و بقي{1} !
لقد حولك المبشرون إلى جماعتهم. أنت الآن مبشر كذلك. كل ليلتين سيكون لديك الفرصة لتحويل لاعب آخر إلى جماعتكم.
مبشرون: {0}

You go into {0}'s house and find them praying before an altar to some unknown god. You quickly run your sword right through the evil cultist.
You go to {0}'s house, but there is no mysterious chanting. You return home, convinced that {0} is not a cultist.

As everyone rises, they find the body of {0} shoved into a pile of stone, blood splattered everywhere. One of your masons has died!
The masons are: {0}
Your newest member heads over to {0}'s house to convert them, but instead finds the house a complete wreck, blood everywhere, and bits of wolf fur snagged on the doorway...
The pack heads to {0}'s house to eat them, but they are met by a tall dark figure, armed to the teeth. The Guardian Angel fights everyone off, and you head back defeated.
You send {0} to try to convert {1}, however their belief was too strong, and you were unable to convert them :(

You slipped into {0}'s house for a bit of fun... but as you are leaving, you happen to notice a strange altar, poorly hidden off in a side room, with a strange glowing coming from it...
was
Everyone wakes up in the morning, and notices that {0} is not around... They check the house to find the remains of {0}.
As the villagers gather as the sun rises, the find the remains of {0}, who died somehow last night...
Odd.... {0} didn't show up for the masons meeting this morning... O.o

No seer!
Time's up!
You are Cupid. Sent to Earth with only underpants, a bow and two arrows, you get to choose two players to love each other for eternity. If one of them dies, the other one dies of sorrow.

You are a Doppelgänger. Legend has it that your ancestors were metamorphs, and could choose any form they wanted. You have inherited some of their capacities. Choose a player, when that player dies, you will take on their role.

You are the town Hunter. You do not sleep well, and you would never go to bed without your rifle. If you die, you can choose someone else to kill. If you are eaten, you have a chance to take a werewolf down, but will not be able to choose a player to kill.
You are the serial killer. Recently escaped from the local asylum, your goal is for everyone else to die. Every night, you can add a player's body to your collection.
You have been struck by love. {0}'s memory will never fade in your heart. If one of you dies, the other one will die out of sorrow. If one of you wins, the other one wins too.
Cupids arrow has struck you! You are madly in love with {0}! If they die, you will die too. If one of you two wins, you will both win.
The village has chosen to hang you! This is your last chance, choose to shoot someone as you go down!
{0} fumbles for their pistol as the noose tightens, but cannot get it in time, and falls to their death with a loud snap of their neck...
{0} whips out their pistol and looks at the crowd... and cannot make a decision on who to shoot. They fall to their death, accepting their fate...
As the noose tightens, {0} whips out a pistol, takes aim, and shoots {1} as the floor drops out! {1} falls over, dead. {2}
You've been murdered! In your last moments, you have the chance to shoot someone... make it quick!
The blow to {0} was too much, so much that they couldn't even reach for their sidearm, as they lay in a pool of blood...
As {0} lays there, gasping for their final breaths, they can't decide who to shoot... and accept their fate.
Dying, {0} falls to the ground.... but not without grasping their pistol, and firing upon {1}, who takes a bullet right between the eyes. {2}

{0} sneaks over to {1}'s house, pops open the door, and is immediately greeted by a crazed maniac with a knife!!! {1} plunges the knife deep into {0}'s organs in alphabetical order, cackling the entire time! {0} is dead D:
The wolves tried to attack the hunter last night, but the hunter was able to take one down with them as he died! {0} has died (wolf)
The wolf tried to attack the hunter last night, but the hunter was able to take the wolf {0} down with their rifle!
The wolves attempted to have a nice late night snack, but were instead greeted by a crazed murderer! {0} was killed in the fight!

It seemed a quiet enough night for {0}, but they were wrong. The villagers gather in the morning to find {0} split from head to toe, but oddly the liver was missing... The serial killer has struck again! {1}
You tried to collect {0}'s body for your collection, but you were fought off by the guardian angel! No kill for you tonight...
The cult sends {0} to try to convert {1}, but instead a shot rings out and {0}'s body comes flying out of the window! {0} is dead....
The cult sends {0} to try to convert {1}, but instead {0}'s body comes flying out of the window, knives pushed into every part of their body! WHAT A PSYCHO! {0} is dead....
You tried to guard the serial killer, but they came out and stabbed you 89 times! You are dead....
You slip into {0}'s house, and start having a little fun. All seems great until {0} pulls out a knife and starts stabbing you, laughing like a maniac! You have died....
The village sees {0}'s body, lying dead in the public square with countless stab wounds. {0} is dead.
The doppelganger {0} has now become a mason, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a mason. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The doppelganger {0} has now become a cultist, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a cultist. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The doppelganger {0} has now become a wolf, just like you!
{0} has died, and you transform into a wolf. Your teammates (if any) are: {1}
The only person left standing is the serial killer! They have won!
Who do you want to kill tonight?
With {0}'s dying breath, {1} rushes over and falls, crying. They cannot stand the loss of their loved one, and shoot themselves with the nearest pistol they can find. {2}
Who do you want to become if they die?
Who do you want the lovers to be? Choose the first player
Who do you want the lovers to be? Choose the second player

You have become the wild child. You role model is {0}
True love endures! The lovers have won!
In the middle of the town square, everyone finds the body of {0}, multiple shots to the body. Looks like they tried to sneak up on the Hunter! {1}
A hooded figure tried to convert you to their cult, but your faith was too strong
You are already on the wait list for {0}
You have been added to the wait list for {0}. I will PM you when the next game is starting.\nWhile waiting, why not browse the store? https://teespring.com/stores/werewolf-for-telegram
A new game is starting in {0}
Morning comes, and the remaining two villagers walk out to the town square. {0} takes a look at {1}, gets a big grin on their face, pulls out a knife, and takes {1} out.
Everyone in the village has died... there's nothing but bodies left. No one wins this round, except the vultures...

As the sun rises, {0} and {1} walk out into the village. {0} pulls out their knife, and jumps at {1}. {1} pulls out a pistol and fires a shot into {0}'s face as {0} lands, plunging the knife deep into {1}. Both are dead, the village is empty, there is no winner...
You failed to make a choice, so the moderator has chosen for you: {0}
Won
Lost
Player {0} has been killed for not voting {1} times in the past 24 hours.
Your role is simple - try to survive. Each day, you will have a chance to lynch the werewolf.
You are the Seer. In this role, each night, you may choose a player, and have their role revealed to you. Admit to your role wisely: If you reveal you are the seer, the wolves will try to kill you!

You get to have fun! Each day, you will attempt to decieve your fellow players. However, each night, you will get to pick a player to kill! Note:if you attack the drunk, you yourself will become drunk, and will be unable to attack the next night as you sleep off your hangover! If you attack the cursed, they will become a wolf like yourself! Hooray friends!

As the harlot (you slut...) you will be given the chance to 'visit' another player each night. If they are not the wolf, you will be told so (because you live!). If you visit a wolf, you will be killed. If you visit the player the wolves have chosen to kill, you will be killed as well. However - If you are visiting a player, and the wolves choose to kill you, you will survive (you weren't home)
You drunken bastard! As the drunk, you are still just a villager. BUT! If the wolves kill you, they will become disabled for the next night, as they are drunk off your insanely high BAC.
As the cursed, you are a normal villager... until the wolves kill you. Once they do, you will become a wolf as well! Free to hunt in the night..... XD
You are a traitorous bastard. If you survive long enough for all the wolves to die, you will become a werewolf, ready to kill your former teammates in the night!
You are the Guardian Angel! Each night, you may choose a player to watch over. Be careful however - if you choose to watch over a wolf, there is a 50% chance you will be killed.
You old sleuth. Each day, you will have the chance to investigate another player. Use this carefully however, for these is a 40% chance the werewolves will detect you!

A bit trigger happy are we? As the gunner, you are given 2 silver bullets at the beginning of the game. Each day, you will have the chance to shoot another player. Once you do, everyone will know you are the gunner! Be careful though, you only have 2 bullets!
The Tanners goal is simple: Get Lynched. If the Tanner gets lynched, he wins, period. Everyone else loses.
he fool is told they are the seer.... when they choose to see someone's role at night, they are told a random role.
As a cultist, it is your goal to convert all other players (except wolves) to your cult. If at the end of the game, all living players are cultist - the cult wins
Your job is to hunt the Cult. If the cult attacks you, their newest member will die. Each night you may pick a player to 'hunt' - if they are a cultist, they will die.
At the beginning of the game, you will choose someone to be your 'role model'. If they die, you become a werewolf.
For now, you are a normal villager. However, if the seer dies, you will become the new seer
You will be told who the seer is (the real one, not the fool)
A mason's job is simple - they automatically know who the other masons are. Otherwise, they are a simple villager.

Your ancestors had the ability to metamorph into others... while you don't have their full abilities, you can pick a player at the start of the game. If that player dies, you will become what they were. Note: If the player was converted to cult, you will take on their original role. All other normal rules apply: If they were Wild Child and their role model died, you will become a wolf. Otherwise, you will inherit their role model. The cult cannot convert the Doppelgänger (but can after the doppelganger switches roles). Also - the Doppelgänger can NOT win unless they have transformed. If at the end of the game, the Doppelgänger is still the same, they lose (exception: lover)

Love is in the air. As Cupid, you will choose two players at the start of the game. These two players will become madly in love! If one of them dies, the other will die of sorrow :( Note: Lovers will know who each other are, but not be told their roles. If the lovers are the last two alive, they win, regardless of teams. If the lovers are on different teams (villager + wolf), and one team wins (wolf), the lover (villager) wins as well. TL;DR if at least one of the lovers was on the winning team, they both win together.

A trigger happy, vindictive player. As the hunter, you try to keep to yourself. However, when others come to visit you, they may find themselves dead, as your paranoia takes hold and you shoot. If the wolves attack you, you have a chance to take one of them with you. Otherwise, if you die, you will get a chance to shoot someone as you die. Note: For wolf attacks, the chance starts at 30%. If there is one wolf, the hunter has a 30% chance to kill the wolf (and survive). For each additional wolf, add 20% (2 wolves = 50%, 3 = 70%, etc). However - if there are multiple wolves, while you may kill one of them, you will still be outnumbered and killed. If the cult tries to convert you, they have a 50% chance to fail. If they fail, you have a 50% chance to kill one of them!

That asylum was silly anyways. What a joke. You are free now however, back to business as usual - killing! The serial killer is a lone player, on their own team. They can win only if they are the last player alive (exception: lovers). As the serial killer, you can kill ANYONE - wolves, hunters, gunners, guardian angels, whatever. If the wolves try to attack you, you will kill one of them (random), and live.
Para is a silly developer that likes to bark at people. Maybe he's been messing with werewolves too long....Messing with werewolves is a very bad idea.

You are the Mayor. Your vote during the lynching will count twice, once you have revealed yourself. You are on the village team
You are secretly the Prince, escaping from your boring, pampered life by spending the day with these peasants. If they try to lynch you, they realize their error, and no one will be lynched.
You are the Clumsy Guy: You’ll try to vote, but there is a 50% chance you’ll vote for someone else other than you intended instead. You’re still on the village team though.

You are the Sorcerer, allying yourself with creatures of the night rather than villagers. At night you will use your power to find the wolves or the Seer. You win only if the wolves win. Enjoy helping snuff out those miserable villagers.

You are the Blacksmith: the metalworker of the village. You have a small amount of silver, enough to prevent the wolves from attacking for one night. During the day, you can choose to powder it and spread it around the village. Other than that, you are just a villager.

You are the Alpha Wolf; the source of the scourge. Your bite is the cause of the curse that turns humans into werewolves. Each night, you will choose a human to attack and kill, but as long as you are alive, your victim has a 20% chance of turning into a werewolf.

You are the Wolf Cub; adored by your wolf pack. Like other wolves, you will choose a villager to attack and kill every night. If you happen to be killed, your wolf pack will fly into a rage and attack two people the next night. You’ll still be dead though.

As the village begins to lynch {0}, they say “Wait! I am the Prince. This royal ring, with the seal of the king proves it. Every night I am surrounded by servants. So I cannot be evil.” Feeling foolish, the villagers sheepishly retire for the night.
You try to look at {0}, but can't quite make out what they are. They are not a wolf or seer however...
{0} steps forward and present the official seal of the Mayor, declaring themselves as such. From now on, {0}'s votes for lynching will count twice.
Click "Reveal" whenever you are ready to reveal yourself as the Mayor
Reveal
Would you like to spread the silver today, disabling the wolves tonight?

As the rest of the village debates over the events, they suddenly notice {0} wandering around spreading silver across the grounds. For now, at least, the village will be safe from wolf attacks. (Wolves are disabled tonight)
the Mayor 🎖
the Prince 👑
the Sorcerer 🔮
the Clumsy Guy 🤕
the Blacksmith ⚒
the Alpha Wolf ⚡️
the Wolf Cub 🐶

As the wolves attack {0}, {1} stops everyone, being the Alpha Wolf. {1} tells the pack that {0} should join the pack instead of dying, so the pack leaves them to their infection. They will become a werewolf tomorrow night.
You were attacked by the wolves, but the Alpha Wolf chose you. Instead of being killed, you have been infected.. and will become a wolf tomorrow night!
As night falls, you feel a strange tingling, and your body aches as it begins to transform.... You are now a werewolf!

As mayor, you are a lowly villager, until you reveal yourself. Then you are given twice the vote count for lynching (meaning that your vote is twice as powerful as everyone else's). Use that power wisely to help the Village Team.

The prince is a key role in the Village Team's strategy. Once the prince gets lynched, their role as Prince is revealed, and they survive. However, this can only happen once: if the village insists on lynching them, they will die.
Do you remember the good old seer? Well now, it has its Wolf Team counterpart. The sorcerer is the Wuff's Seer. They can only see if someone is Wolf or Seer, and they win with the Wolves.

You are the Clumsy Guy. Maybe you should not have had so much alcohol for breakfast. You can't see a damn thing. Can you even vote for the person you want to? (You have a 50% chance to vote for someone random.)

You are the BlackSmith. Through the years, no blades nor swords gave you as much satisfaction as the Silver Blades the elves ordered.\nYou might have some silverdust left. Who knows ? It might *prevent Wolves from eating tonight* 🤔
You are the Alpha Wolf, the origin of the curse, the bane of banes. While you are alive, the Pack's meal has 20% chances to join your ranks.

What a cuuuute little wuff. _tickles tickles_ -cough cough- As i was saying, you are the Wolf Cub and you _drops the mic_ -I just can't resist that. I think if anyone killed you, i'd give the wuffs two victims. You're too cute to die. I wouldn't be able to tickle you anymore-
